mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ADMIN WHERE GRADE = 'D' AND NAME = #{name} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT N.NO AS NO ,N.NOTICE_CNO AS NOTICE_CNO ,C.NAME AS NOTICE_CNAME ,N.WRITER_NO AS WRITER_NO ,A.NAME AS WRITER_NAME ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,N.STATUS ,N.HIT ,IMPORTANT_YN FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY C ON N.NOTICE_CNO = C.NO JOIN ADMIN A ON N.WRITER_NO = A.NO WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY N.ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT B.NO AS NO ,B.WRITER_NO AS WRITER_NO ,M.NAME AS WRITER_NAME ,B.BOARD_CNO AS BOARD_CNO ,C.NAME AS BOARD_CNAME ,TITLE ,B.CONTENT AS CONTENT ,B.ENROLL_DATE AS ENROLL_DATE ,B.MODIFY_DATE AS MODIFY_DATE ,HIT FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY C ON B.BOARD_CNO = C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON B.WRITER_NO = M.NO ORDER BY HIT DESC
SELECT * FROM MEMBER_CALENDAR WHERE WRITER_NO = #{no} ORDER BY START_DATE
SELECT * FROM MEMBER M JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, SUM(SCORE) AS SCORE FROM POINT GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) Q ON Q.MEMBER_NO = M.NO

SELECT DONG_NUM, SUM(SCORE) AS SCORE FROM (SELECT * FROM MEMBER M JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, SUM(SCORE) AS SCORE FROM POINT GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) Q ON Q.MEMBER_NO = M.NO) GROUP BY DONG_NUM ORDER BY SCORE DESC
SELECT * FROM NOTICE_CALENDAR ORDER BY START_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE ANSWER_DATE IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE ANSWER_DATE IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'W'

SELECT SUM(PRICE) PRICE, NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME FROM (SELECT * FROM ADMIN_FEE AF JOIN ADMIN_FEE_CATEGORY AFC ON AF.FEE_CNO = AFC.NO) WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CAST(PAYMENT_DATE AS DATE)) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CAST(SYSDATE AS DATE)) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CAST(PAYMENT_DATE AS DATE)) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CAST(SYSDATE AS DATE)) GROUP BY NAME

SELECT SUM(PRICE) FROM ADMIN_FEE WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CAST(PAYMENT_DATE AS DATE)) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CAST(SYSDATE AS DATE)) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CAST(PAYMENT_DATE AS DATE)) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CAST(SYSDATE AS DATE))
